name: glitch-hello-react
description: A simple React single page app, built with Vite and React.

scripts.publish: FASTLY_SERVICE_ID=$(cat .env | grep FASTLY_SERVICE_ID= | cut -d '=' -f2) && fastly backend create --version latest --name=origin_0 --address=$PROJECT_DOMAIN.glitch.me --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID && fastly domain create --version latest --name=$PROJECT_DOMAIN.global.ssl.fastly.net --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID && fastly service-version activate --version latest --autoclone --service-id=$FASTLY_SERVICE_ID
